https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/xMuvkJZLecyAA75CJJTV7dN6T97.jpg Based on Rabindranath Tagore’s famous short story 'Kabuliwala', the film is about a young girl’s quest to discover more about her dead father’s friend who used to play bioscope shows for her as a kid. Bioscopewala
